pull.title: Avoid expanding descriptor scriptPubKeys
pull.body:
Output scripts aren't needed in `GetAffectedKeys`, this change avoids computing them.

Based on #14821.

events.message: Replace CAffectedKeysVisitor with descriptor based logic

events.body:

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#14646](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/14646.html) (Add expansion cache functions to descriptors (unused for now) by sipa)
* [#14144](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/14144.html) (Refactoring: Clarify code using encrypted_batch in CWallet by domob1812)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
